item.name: Star Seafood Floating Restaurant
item.location: 55 Tai Chung Kiu Road, Sha Tin, Hong Kong
item.description: Guangdong / Dim Sum / Chinese Restaurant / Dim Sum Restaurant / Drivers Friendly Dining / Group Dining.

item.name: Kau Kee Restaurant
item.description: With over 90 years of history on Gough Street, Kau Kee still never fails to deliver its most popular Beef Brisket Noodles in Clear Broth. What distinguishes Kau Kee from other noodle restaurants is that they only serve Beef Brisket in Clear broth and curry soup.

item.name: L'Atelier de Joël Robuchon
item.description: Joel Robuchon was the most influential French chef of the post-nouvelle cuisine era. Commonly regarded as the primus inter pares of Paris' 3 star chefs for his work, a meal at Robuchon's restaurant had always been known to be of relentless perfectionism.

item.name: Kung Lee
item.description: The place for desserts. Be sure to try the sugarcane juice.

item.name: 千燒百味
item.location: 赤鱲角香港國際機場翔天廊第三層3P118號舖
item.description: 一向只會因趕時間或無選擇的情況下，才惠顧快餐店。千燒百味是屬於香港一家快餐集團旗下的食肆。

item.name: Pierre at the Mandarin
item.description: Long renowned as Hong Kong’s favourite dining room, The Grill serves an exciting adaptation of grill specialties with a dash of progressive gastronomy from the talented Executive Chef Uwe Opocensky, Expect to pay $500.

item.name: The Peak Lookout
item.description: Located in a heritage house at Victoria Gap, near the summit of Victoria Peak on Hong Kong Island

item.name: Mak's Noodle
item.description: The soup base is made of powdered dried flounder, dried shrimp roe and pork bones. The small serving bowls keep the noodles from going soggy.

item.name: Lab Made Liquid Nitrogen Ice Cream Laboratory
item.location: 6 Brown Street, Tai Hang, Hong Kong
item.description: They use dry ice to make the ice cream and every now and then the ice vapor will spill over the counter onto the street to the 'oohs' and 'aahs' of the spectators.

item.name: Yung Kee
item.description: Yung Kee is most famous for its roast goose, and serves as many as 300 whole birds per day.

item.name: Joy Hing Roasted Meat
item.location: 265 Hennessy Road, Wan Chai , Hong Kong
item.description: Chinese barbecue. A popular and well known eatery and most of the time, very difficult to find a spare table.

item.name: Mambella's
item.location: 160 Columbia St. West, Waterloo, Ontario, N2L 3L3
item.description: Do you want it? Come and get it!
